npc_output: Not much, just enjoying the festival. It's so hot today! |r1|
I'm a bit angry and bored, but I'm trying to stay cheerful. Want to talk about something interesting? |r3|
Just the usual royal business. But I've been feeling a bit tired lately. Maybe it's time to go hunting. |r5|
I'm a witch, and I love collecting and hunting. But I'm a bit curious, what brings you here? |r1|
Actually, I have a lot of urgent messages to deliver. Maybe you could help me with that? |r2|
I love painting and magic! And I'm a bit anxious about my research. |r3|
That sounds great! I've been wanting to catch some fish before the storm. |r1|
It's getting late, and I still have to row my boat. Care to join me? |r3|
It's doing well, but I'm a bit excited about the harvest. Want to help me sow some seeds? |r1|
Actually, I could use some help with this outfit. It needs to be embroidered before the festival. |r1|
